metadata.NAME: JinsMeme
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Collects data from the JINSMeme Eyeglass

dataDescriptors.NAME: Eye Movement (UP)
dataDescriptors.DESCRIPTION: Eye Movement up. 0: None, 1:Movement detection—Small, 2:Movement detection—Medium, 3:Reverse movement detection—Large, 4:Reverse movement detection—Extra-large (FW 1.0.7 only)

dataDescriptors.NAME: Noise Status
dataDescriptors.DESCRIPTION: Boolean value about whether the electrooculography sensors have noise or not

metadata.NAME: JinsMeme
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Collects data from the JINSMeme Eyeglass

dataDescriptors.NAME: Fit Error
dataDescriptors.DESCRIPTION: Integer indicating if JINS MEME is being worn correctly. 0: No errors, 1: Left nose-pad placement error, 2: Right nose-pad placement error, 3: Bridge electrode placement error

metadata.NAME: Fit Error
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Integer indicating if JINS MEME is being worn correctly. 0: No errors, 1: Left nose-pad placement error, 2: Right nose-pad placement error, 3: Bridge electrode placement error

metadata.NAME: JinsMeme
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Collects data from the JINSMeme Eyeglass

dataDescriptors.NAME: Power Left
dataDescriptors.DESCRIPTION: Integer showing remaining battery. 0: Charging battery, 1: Low voltage, 2：Lv2, 3：Lv3, 4：Lv4, 5: Battery fully charged

metadata.NAME: Power Left
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Integer showing remaining battery. 0: Charging battery, 1: Low voltage, 2：Lv2, 3：Lv3, 4：Lv4, 5: Battery fully charged
